pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, November 10, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, November 10, 2017:

All times local.

Da Nang, Vietnam

10:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Da Nang, Vietnam.

Da Nang International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity upon arrival

12:50 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the United Mexican States, Enrique Peña Nieto.

Bilateral Room #4, 2nd Floor
Furama Resort Da Nang

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Japan, Shinzō Abe.

Bilateral Room #4, 2nd Floor
Furama Resort Da Nang

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the TPP-11 Leaders’ Meeting.

Quang Nam Room, Ground Floor
Furama Resort Da Nang

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chief Operating Officer of Facebook, Sheryl Sandberg‎.

Bilateral Room #4, 2nd Floor
Furama Resort Da Nang

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the State Counsellor of Myanmar, Aung San Suu Kyi.

Bilateral Room #4, 2nd Floor
Furama Resort Da Nang

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an informal dialogue with ASEAN Leaders.

Ocean Room, 2nd Floor
Furama Resort Da Nang

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Official Welcoming of APEC Leaders.

Pre-Function Hall, Ground Floor
Sheraton Da Nang Resort

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an APEC Leaders’ Official Photograph.

Pre-Function Hall, Ground Floor
Sheraton Da Nang Resort

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

8 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the APEC Leaders’ Official Dinner given by the President of Vietnam and Madam Nguyen Thi Hien.

Grand Ballroom, 2nd Floor
Sheraton Da Nang Resort

Closed to media
